titles.title: A bill to provide for a United States contribution to the Interest Subsidy Account of the successor (ESAF II) to the Enhanced Structural Adjustment Facility of the International Monetary Fund.

action.text: Sponsor introductory remarks on measure. (CR S3455-3456)
Read twice and referred to the Committee on Foreign Relations.

bill.summary: 3/22/1994--Introduced. Amends the Bretton Woods Agreements Act to authorize the U.S. Governor of the International Monetary Fund to contribute $100 million to the Interest Subsidy Account of the successor (ESAF II) to the Enhanced Structural Adjustment Facility. Authorizes appropriations.
